    • Method Detail

      • getShortDescription

        String getShortDescription()
        Gets the short description. It's used to choose the text object e.g. in the text object suggestion frame.
        Returns:
        was:
        getKurzBez

      • setShortDescription

        void setShortDescription(String description)
        Sets the short description.
        Parameters:
        description - the new short description (i.e. the title) of this textobject. The title will be trimmed if needed. If a null-value is given it will be automatically be converted into the empty string.

        Sets the list of categories this textobject has been assigned to.
        Parameters:
